info.title: Kred
info.description: Kred, created by PeopleBrowsr, measures influence in online communities connected by interest. Kred values audience quality and engagement over audience size. It assesses the ability to inspire action (Influence) and propensity to engage with others (Outreach).

get.description: Returns Kred Influence + Outreach by community for any Twitter @name.Default community is currently set to the Global Kred Community. Update to specify communities will be released soon.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: source=twitter will return a user's kred score from Twitter; source=facebook will return kred score for user who has uploaded facebook;source=combined will return the combined kred score for users for both Facebook and Twitter.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Twitter @[name] or username. Must use only name. Example: term=pepsi; term=@pepsi will not return data.
